item.title: Exploring Adakite using Python
item.description: We download the precompiled data of adakite from GEOROC database. For a simple impression of adakite, the wikipedia page gives some clue: Adakites are volcanic rocks of intermediate to felsic composition that have geochemical characteristics of magma thought to have formed by partial melting of altered basalt that is subducted below volcanic arcs. In this example, we demonstrate how to use python to simplify the data, discard the null data, classify and plot the geochemical properties.
